response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value to us, but we understand its true worth to you is $10,000. With this in mind, I propose an offer that reflects both the value we place on it and its importance to you. For a limited time, I am willing to extend a special offer of $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
